name: How To HotDog
description:
Work in your very own hot dog food truck. Serve the best hot dogs in town!

Will you beat the high-score?

The game was made during Global Game Jam 2017 in 48 hours.

Credits:

  • Art: Gina Voerde (Portfolio)
  • Coder: Martin Gebske (LinkedIn)
  • Coder: Martin Beierling (Website)
  • Sounds: Christian Kippelt (Youtube-Channel)
